title: The Titanic Conspiracy
description: The Titanic was labelled unsinkable by its manufacturers. It, however, defied all odds and sank to the bottom of the Atlantic Ocean on its maiden voyage. What was the real cause of the disaster? How did the unsinkable sank? It is said the ship was cursed by one of its passengers who was not welcome on board. This story tells the strange and incredible tale.
author: Vincent McKalin
